trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for describing the structure of a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade básica para descrever a estrutura de uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> interface to describe a custom data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Implementar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> interface para descrever uma fonte de dados personalizado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema> classes implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.XmlDocumentSchema>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TypeSchema> classes implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> interface.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> are used by custom control designer components to provide lists of fields and views for data-bound controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: As classes que implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema> são usados pelos componentes do designer de controle personalizado para fornecer a lista de campos e exibições para controles associados a dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of schema descriptors for views contained in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de descritores de esquema para exibições contidas na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema.GetViews%2A> method returns an array of objects that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> interface.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema.GetViews%2A> método retorna uma matriz de objetos que implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> interface.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the array returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, each element of the array is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> object that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, na matriz retornada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema.GetViews%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> , cada elemento da matriz é uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> objeto que implementa <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema>.
